section2.intro: Matrix Layer Phone is designed to break the limitations of traditional mobile devices by deeply integrating blockchain technology into smartphones through innovative hardware and software, simplifying users' access to Web3 and enhancing their overall experience.
section2.footer: Redefining the Gateway to the Blockchain Ecosystem

section2-sub.info1: The world's first mobile blockchain network node with iris authentication.
section2-sub.footer2: Iris login, identification information ZK encryption
section2-sub.info3: The first full-chain ecological Web3 mobile phone
section2-sub.footer3: One device in hand, interacts with the global ecosystem.

section3.title: smartphone assistant
section3.info: Follow Sam Altman's thoughts and let technology serve life

purchaseHardware.title: Purchase Hardware
purchaseHardware.description: Instantly receive rewards as a network node.

ecosystemAirdrops.title: Ecosystem Airdrops
ecosystemAirdrops.description: Receive airdrops from ecosystem partners over time as part of the rewards.

promoteHardware.title: Promote Hardware
promoteHardware.description: Earn promotional rewards for expanding the network node ecosystem. Continue earning over time.

profitSharing.title: Profit Sharing
profitSharing.description: The more users you bring in, the more airdrops and ecosystem rewards they earn, and you’ll receive a share of those rewards.

stakingRewards.title: Staking Rewards
stakingRewards.description: After becoming a network node, you can stake assets and receive additional incentives.

AIFinancialManagement.title: AI Financial Management
AIFinancialManagement.description: Matrix Layer Phone serves as a hardware wallet that not only stores assets but continuously generates income for you through automated AI-driven investments.

section1.subtitle: mobile hardware
section1.info: MatrixLayerPhone is an intelligent hardware and owns diverse application scenarios, offers users a convenient entry point for accessing decentralized networks and Web3 applications in their daily lives. MLPhone brings an unprecedented experience for individuals and infinite opportunities for businesses, developers, and society as a whole.

benefits.title: User Benefits
benefits.bottom: The actual specifications of the delivered product may differ from the official descriptions due to material supply constraints and other uncontrollable factors. MatrixLayerProtocol reserves the right to make changes to the product specifications without prior notice.

tokens.title: Built-in Tokens
tokens.description: Each phone comes pre-installed with 20,000 $MLP tokens, to be released linearly over a period of 1.5 years.

experience.title: Mining Experience
experience.description: Phone holders are granted 10 days of basic pool mining rights (a limited-time offer), with mining speeds matching that of AI Agent One

airdrops.title: Ecosystem Token Airdrops
airdrops.description: Holders of the phone are eligible for future ecosystem token airdrops across the entire chain

node.title: Platform Node
node.description: The phone serves as a platform node, participating in network operations

agentOne.title: AI Agent One
agentOne.desc1: Purchase $199 worth of $MLP to activate the NFT (the tokens will be burned after activation).

agentPro.title: AI Agent Pro
agentPro.desc1: Purchase $699 worth of $MLP to activate the NFT (the tokens will be burned after activation).

agentUltra.title: AI Agent Ultra
agentUltra.desc1: Purchase $899 worth of $MLP to activate the NFT (the tokens will be burned after activation).

Checkout.statement: I understand that this is a non-refundable pre-order deposit.
Checkout.disclaimer: By clicking ‘PAY NOW’, I acknowledge that I am committing to pre-ordering a product that is not immediately available. I also confirm that I have reviewed and agree to the terms outlined in the <policy>Privacy Policy</policy> and <terms>Terms & Conditions</terms>.

term-1.title: 1. Introduction
term-1.content: Welcome to Matrix Layer Protocol. These Terms & Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these terms.

term-2.title: 2. Description of Services
term-2.content: MLPhone, integrating cutting-edge AI and Depin technology to usher in a new era of the Web3 ecosystem. With advanced iris recognition technology, MLPhone provides you with a unique digital identity while ensuring the safety of your privacy. Relying on the Matrix Layer Protocol, a new decentralized ecosystem is constructed, with the MLP underlying protocol offering robust security for network communications. The diverse intelligent hardware and application scenarios of MLPhone make it easy to access decentralized networks.

term-3.title: 3. Use of Services
term-3.content: You agree to use our services in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. Unauthorized use of our services, including but not limited to reverse engineering or unauthorized distribution, is strictly prohibited.

term-4.title: 4. User Accounts
term-4.content: To access certain features of our services, you may need to create a user account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.

term-5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
term-5.content: All content, trademarks, service marks, logos, and software on this website are the property of Matrix Layer Protocol or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws. Unauthorized use of this content is prohibited.

term-6.title: 6. Privacy Policy
term-6.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for information on how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

term-7.title: 7. Disclaimers
term-7.content: Our services are provided “as is” without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any information on our website or through our products.

term-8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
term-8.content: Matrix Layer Protocol shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use our services, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, and consequential damages.

term-9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
term-9.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms & Conditions at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

term-10.title: 10. Governing Law
term-10.content: These Terms & Conditions are governed by the laws of [Your Jurisdiction]. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved in the courts of [Your Jurisdiction].

term-11.title: 11. Contact Us
term-11.content: If you have any questions about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us at <email>info@matrixlayer.ai</email>

Stake.phoneInfo: MLPhone NFT come with 10 days of mining rights in the basic pool. Once staking begins, it cannot be ended prematurely; canceling the stake early will render the NFT invalid.
Stake.matrixInfo: Matrix NFTs come with 7 days of mining rights in the basic pool. Once staking begins, it cannot be ended prematurely; canceling the stake early will render the NFT invalid.
Stake.basicPoolInfo: Your mining power in the basic pool is determined by the number and value of the NFTs you have staked.

AccelerationPool.title: Acceleration Pool (PoS)
AccelerationPool.info: Your mining power in the accelerated pool is determined by the amount of $MLP you have staked.

Stake.promotionPoolInfo: Your mining power in the referral pool is determined by the mining power of the friends you have invited.
Stake.noNFTStakeAlert: You don't have any <nft>NFT</nft> to stake
Stake.noNFTUnstakeAlert: You don't have any <nft>NFT</nft> to unstake
Stake.unlockPool: Stake your <nft>NFT</nft> to unlock this pool

AccelerateNFTBoostedPool.title: Accelerate NFT Boosted Pool
AccelerateNFTBoostedPool.info: MLPhone NFT come with 10 days of mining rights in the basic pool. Once staking begins, it cannot be ended prematurely; canceling the stake early will render the NFT invalid.

accelerateMLPBoostedPool.title: Accelerate MLP Boosted Pool
accelerateMLPBoostedPool.info: MLPhone NFT come with 10 days of mining rights in the basic pool. Once staking begins, it cannot be ended prematurely; canceling the stake early will render the NFT invalid.
accelerateMLPBoostedPool.statement: Will the earnings be reinvested? Reinvestment will lock your funds and you will not be able to withdraw early during the lock-up period.
accelerateMLPBoostedPool.disclaimer: Disclaimer : APY Rates are calculated based on yesterday’s the pool status as an approzimate reference and <gradient>might not be 100% accurate</gradient>
